alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Lawrence; Washington (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 20 at 7:31AM EST until December 21 at 10:25PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River at Seymour. White River at Elliston, and from Edwardsport to Hazleton. .Rainfall of 1 to 2 inches from Friday night into Saturday caused minor flooding to develop along portions of the White River and the East Fork White River in southern parts of central Indiana. The crest on the White River is nearing Edwardsport with points downstream steady to slowly rising. The crest on the East Fork White River is near Seymour with flooding expected to end by late Tuesday. Flooding along the White River is expected to last into Thursday for points downstream of Newberry. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...East Fork White River at Seymour. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 13.5 feet, Lowland flood continues. Jackson County Road 700 E begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 AM EST Monday the stage was 13.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:45 AM EST Monday was 13.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning and continue falling to 6.7 feet early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued later this morning.
